name: KongFu Master
description:
KongFu Master

Game name: KongFu Master

Genre: Platformer , Side-scrolling action games

ESRB: Everyone

Number of players: 1

Developer: ZuranBi

Contact: blvin908603325@gmail.com

Release Date: 2022/6/19

Price: FREE

Brief

You will play a kung fu master from another city - Ming, Ming wants to build a dojo of his own, but the city's dojos are controlled by KONG, so Ming must defeat KONG, only by successfully defeating this dominant master who rules all the dojos, Ming can build a dojo of his own. Only by successfully defeating this overlord who rules all the dojos can Ming establish a dojo of his own. Defeat all the enemies on each level within a certain period of time, then move on to the next level and finally defeat the final boss - KONG.

Features

Experience the legendary kung fu!

Destroy all the enemies in the shortest time possible within the time limit!

Enemies will get progressively stronger at each level, so watch out! Once you fail, you must start from the beginning!

Find the entrance to the next level in the complex map!

Find the most correct route to the entrance, if you miss it you will fall down!
